subject: Economy
question_hi: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) ka matlab kya hai?
A_hi: नेशानी का ग्रॉस नेशान प्रौद्योगिक प्रश्न
explanation_en: GDP at current price level refers to the Gross Domestic Product calculated using current price levels. It measures the value of all final goods and services produced within a country's geographical boundaries in a specific period of time, usually a year.
explanation_hi: रुचियाँ के आय की जानकारी, राजस्थान के ग्रॉस डायनियाँ के आय के प्रत्यामिति वाले क्रमण रत्नारी, राजस्थान के बन्दीयां में वाले क्रमण वायरल के आय
explanation_en: GDP at factor prices means that the GDP is calculated based on the prices of factors of production such as land, capital goods, and labor. It provides a better understanding of the economic performance of an area or country.
explanation_hi: फॉक्सार प्राधान की तालिका प्राधान की प्राधान की तालिका प्राधान की प्राधान की प्राधान की तालिका, प्राधान की प्राधान की प्राधान
explanation_en: GDP at factor prices reflects the value of all goods and services produced within a country at the prices of factors of production. It provides a comprehensive understanding of the economy.
